BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions

Items.Title: Application no. 20125330 HAX, an Urban Development Action Area Project located at 1664, 1694, and 1702 Davidson Avenue, Council District no. 16, Borough of The Bronx.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant to Article 16 of the New York General Municipal Law, at the request of the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development and pursuant to Section 696 of the General Municipal Law for an exemption from real property taxes.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: UDAAP, 1664, 1694, and 1702 Davidson Ave, Bronx (20125330 HAX)
